title: The Archive at Work
abstract: Lost and Found. The story of repatriation, restoration and an insight into the work of the National Film and Sound Archive.
description: A rare glimpse into the fascinating behind the scenes work of the National Film and Sound Archive. A series of three short works demonstrating the sometimes urgent and important work undertaken in the field of research and preserving audiovisual works.
member_object: Title; B2002623; [1897 Melbourne Cup Flipbook]; Active; 2011
Title; B2001709; The Story of the Kelly Gang [fragments with commentary]; Active; 1906
